snippet: Renting rooms, apartments or houses to travelers through the popular online company Airbnb often violates laws in New York City and elsewhere and could cost hosts dearly.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column warns that renting rooms, apartments or houses to travelers through the popular online company Airbnb often violates laws in New York City and elsewhere and could cost hosts dearly.
lead_paragraph: Renting rooms, apartments or houses to travelers through the popular online company Airbnb often violates laws in New York City and elsewhere and could cost hosts dearly.

headline.print_headline: A Warning For Hosts Of Airbnb Travelers
headline.seo: A Warning for Airbnb Hosts, Who May Be Breaking the Law
headline.main: A Warning for Hosts of Airbnb Travelers
